scripts.install:ccc:pr: set -eux -- 314; cd packages; git clone https://github.com/ckb-devrel/ccc.git || exit 0; cd ccc; st=true; for p in $@; do git fetch origin pull/$p/head:pr-$p; if $st; then git checkout pr-$p; st=false; else git merge --no-ff --no-edit pr-$p; fi; done; pnpm -r install
scripts.clean:deep: rm -fr dist node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm -r clean:deep
scripts.revamp: pnpm clean:deep && pnpm -r up && pnpm build:all && pnpm lint
scripts.sync:template: pnpm -r --filter !./apps/interface --filter !./packages/utils --filter !. -c exec 'for f in .npmignore tsconfig.json typedoc.json vitest.config.mts; do cp ../../packages/utils/$f .; done'
